Oak Lawn.Oak Lawn station:
Oak Lawn is a station on Metra's SouthWest Service in Oak Lawn, Illinois. The station is 14.7 miles (23.7 km) away from Union Station, the northern terminus of the line. In Metra's zone-based fare system, Oak Lawn is in zone D.
Trains operate as far north as Chicago Union Station, and as far south as Orland Park and Manhattan.
